text:
Because the jakarta-tomcat-connectors-jk2-2.0.4-src/jk/native2/configure script 
is looking for libapr as a .so library instead of .dylib for libapr, configure 
fails. Mac OS uses .dylib for dynamic libraries. See jakarta-tomcat-connectors-
jk2-2.0.4-src/jk/native2/configure lines 18730-18738 and 18927-18935.
creator: jluros@qualys.com
yoavs@computer.org
text: Can you please suggest a patch and attach it to this bugzilla item?

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
I've changed the priorty to Normal, because this is certainly not a Blocker.  I 
tend to think it's not major either, as I haven't seen complaints.  But 
anyways, if you submit a patch I'll be glad to review and commit it: I want 
this to work on the Mac as well, but don't have the MacOS knowledge myself to 
do it.  And apparently no one else cares that much, as it's been more than a 
month now since this issue was submitted.

Hmm, no action here or on the mailing list.  I'm closing this item for now due 
to lack of interest from both the tomcat developer and the original 
submitter .  Feel free to reopen WHEN you have a patch, not until then, 
please.  Thank..
creator: yoavs@computer.org
